channel.title: Why is Radix unverified/ranked so low on CoinMarketCap?
channel.description:
The Market Cap on [CoinMarketCap](https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/radix-protocol/) is currently unverified because it requires independent price data from at least 3 different exchanges.
Once XRD is traded on more exchanges then the Market Cap will become **verified** on CoinMarketCap and XRD will be ranked correctly.
